F1,E2.Name: Incompatible software
F1,E2.Description: Service is required. Call 866-333-4591 for Service.

F2,E2.Name: Communication error between UI and control
F2,E2.Description: The product is experiencing a problem and needs to be reset. Turn off power to the dishwasher by turning off the circuit breaker for one (1) minute. Turn on power to the dishwasher by turning on the circuit breaker. Monitor the dishwasher for one (1) minute to ensure the error code does not display again. Verify dishwasher operation. If the problem persists, call 866-333-4591 for Service.

F2,E3.Name: Incompatible software
F2,E3.Description: Service is required. Call 866-333-4591 for Service.

NestSettings.QuietWhileHome.Name: Quiet While Home
NestSettings.QuietWhileHome.Description: Your dishwasher will automatically go into Quiet Mode when Nest™ knows you’re home.
NestSettings.WashWhileAway.Name: Wash While Away
NestSettings.WashWhileAway.Description: When Nest™ detects you're away, your dishwasher will start the selected cycle.  Please note that it may take up to two hours for Nest™ to send the away signal.
NestSettings.SmartEnergy.Name: Smart Delay
NestSettings.SmartEnergy.Description: Use Smart Delay to delay your dishwasher from running during peak energy hours.

AffreshNudge.Name: Affresh Status Notification
AffreshNudge.Description: It is recommended that you use affresh every month to keep your dishwasher clean and fresh.

ControlUnlocked.Name: Control Lock Notification
ControlUnlocked.Description: The control lock on your appliance has been de-activated.

DishesClean.Name: Cycle Complete
DishesClean.Description: The clean indicator on your dishwasher has been activated to show cycle complete.

FilterNudge.Name: Filter Status Notification
FilterNudge.Description: For optimal cleaning performance it is recommended that you clean both your upper and lower filters of your dishwasher at this time.

SaniRinse.Name: Sani Rinse
SaniRinse.Description: Sanitizes dishes and glassware in accordance with NSF International NSF/ANSI Standard 184 for Residential Dishwashers. The Sanitize indicator at the end of the cycle will shows whether the Sani Rinse option was successfully completed.

AffreshDishwasherCleaner.Name: affresh® Dishwasher Cleaner
AffreshDishwasherCleaner.Description: Power away - the right way affresh® Dishwasher Clearn is specially formulated to help remove limescale and mineral build-up that can be unsightly and could affect your dishwasher's performance. Each tablet is designed to clean inside your machine while your detergent cleans your dishes.*
AffreshDishwasherCleaner.Disclaimer: check manufacturer's suggest cleaning instructions on all dishwasher-save items.

SmartTip.Title: Interested in improved drying for your dishes?
SmartTip.Content: Improve drying performance and control buildup of hard water deposits by using rinse aid, which allows water to drain off your dishes after the final rinse.

SmartTip.Title: Want to keep your dishwasher performing at its best?
SmartTip.Content: Regular filter maintenance optimizes water and energy conservation. Cleaning and rinsing both upper and lower filters once a month helps your dishwasher continue to provide optimal cleaning.

SmartTip.Title: Ready to conserve even more energy?
SmartTip.Content: Delay starting a dishwasher cycle when energy demand is high by opting into Smart Delay through your local utility company.* This could even result in a lower energy bill. *For informational purposes only. Not all time-of-use rate plans are compatable with Energy Advisor.

SmartTip.Title: Need a cycle you can't find on the control panel?
SmartTip.Content: Get the right clean for your load by downloading specialty cycles with the Download & Go™ option. You can customize your cleaning even more by creating and saving your own cycle, too.

NotificationContents.SmsText: It is recommended that you use affresh every month to keep your dishwasher clean.
NotificationContents.EmailText: It is recommended that you use affresh every month to keep your dishwasher clean.
NotificationContents.PushText: It is recommended that you use affresh every month to keep your dishwasher clean.

NotificationContents.SmsText: The control lock on your appliance has been de-activated.
NotificationContents.EmailText: The control lock on your appliance has been de-activated.
NotificationContents.PushText: The control lock on your appliance has been de-activated.

NotificationContents.SmsText: For optimal cleaning performance it is recommended that you clean both your upper and lower filters of your dishwasher at this time.
NotificationContents.EmailText: For optimal cleaning performance it is recommended that you clean both your upper and lower filters of your dishwasher at this time.
NotificationContents.PushText: For optimal cleaning performance it is recommended that you clean both your upper and lower filters of your dishwasher at this time.

NotificationContents.SmsText: Sanitizes according to NSF International Standard 184 for Residential Dishwashers. The Sanitize indicator at the end of cycle shows whether the Sani Rinse option was successful.
NotificationContents.EmailText: Sanitizes according to NSF International Standard 184 for Residential Dishwashers. The Sanitize indicator at the end of cycle shows whether the Sani Rinse option was successful.
NotificationContents.PushText: Sanitizes according to NSF International Standard 184 for Residential Dishwashers. The Sanitize indicator at the end of cycle shows whether the Sani Rinse option was successful.

NotificationContents.Title: Wi-fi Connection Interrupted
NotificationContents.Text: Wi-fi connection to your dishwasher was interrupted and Wash While Away has been disabled.

NotificationContents.Title: Remote Control Disabled
NotificationContents.Text: The remote control enabled was disabled. This will prevent the Wash While Away from starting.

NotificationContents.Title: Wash While Away Cancelled
NotificationContents.Text: A dishwasher setting has changed, so the current Wash While Away setup was cancelled.
